attributes.action: Keep the name of the new polar research vessel as Boaty Mcboatface
attributes.background: The science minister Jo Johnson has said that the name Boaty McBoatface is a stupid idea and doesn't deserve to count but we live in a democracy and this won the vote by a landslide and deserves its place.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the Natural Environment Research Council, not the Government or Parliament.
